These are examples of badges you might want to add to your README: please update the URLs accordingly .. image:: https://api.cirrus-ci.com/github/<USER>/dragtooth.svg?branch=main :alt: Built Status :target: https://cirrus-ci.com/github/<USER>/dragtooth .. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/dragtooth/badge/?version=latest :alt: ReadTheDocs :target: https://dragtooth.readthedocs.io/en/stable/ .. image:: https://img.shields.io/coveralls/github/<USER>/dragtooth/main.svg :alt: Coveralls :target: https://coveralls.io/r/<USER>/dragtooth .. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/dragtooth.svg :alt: PyPI-Server :target: https://pypi.org/project/dragtooth/ .. image:: https://img.shields.io/conda/vn/conda-forge/dragtooth.svg :alt: Conda-Forge :target: https://anaconda.org/conda-forge/dragtooth .. image:: https://pepy.tech/badge/dragtooth/month :alt: Monthly Downloads :target: https://pepy.tech/project/dragtooth .. image:: https://img.shields.io/twitter/url/http/shields.io.svg?style=social&label=Twitter :alt: Twitter :target: https://twitter.com/dragtooth.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/-PyScaffold-005CA0?logo=pyscaffold :alt: Project generated with PyScaffold :target: https://pyscaffold.org/|=========dragtooth========= Add a short description here!A longer description of your project goes here..... _pyscaffold-notes:Making Changes & Contributing=============================This project uses `pre-commit`_, please make sure to install it before making anychanges:: pip install pre-commit cd dragtooth pre-commit installIt is a good idea to update the hooks to the latest version:: pre-commit autoupdateDon't forget to tell your contributors to also install and use pre-commit... _pre-commit: https://pre-commit.com/Note====This project has been set up using PyScaffold 4.3.1. For details and usageinformation on PyScaffold see https://pyscaffold.org/.
